name: command
title: Command
description: A 'Business' or 'Aggregate' Command used with the CQRS pattern

id.description: A GUID used to identify the command

targetName.description: The name of the aggregate or process being affected

targetId.description: A GUID identifying an affected aggregate root or process

targetVersion.description: The target revision (serves as an optimistic lock token)

body.description: The JSON Patch, JSON object, or JSON-based process spec.

context.description: Additional context needed to process the command
